thought: To craft an iron_ingot, I need to smelt the iron_ore at slot 45 into an empty slot (eg., 44).
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

Ok
